nodes.text: Roh'Saren the Red was a male Tusken Raider chief living on Tatooine until 3643 BBY, when he was killed.

Roh'Saren appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Tatooine. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
